::JetV::
"You got it...Lets go." he said walking down into the darkness.
"Lights, computer.." he said as the lights turned on a computer voice
came on.
"Good morning JetV.  Welcome guest. (Artemis) The ship is fully fueled
and ready to go.  LAst report is that Pacifix is still with the council."
JetV replied "Computer this is Artemis. She will be a scout with me on
this mission. Please update your memory banks of her info." he then
looked back to Artemis. "I will show you the ship now."

> surprise, "I, I
> > > > > would ve

> > > > > to

> > > > > > > > > > > him anymore, "Your battle skills and expertise

> > > be
> > > > > > > extremely

> > > > > > > > > changes
> > > > > > > > > > > to one of defense, "Grimlock, there are more ways
> that
> > > > > > > outright
> > > > > > > > > > > violence to solve problems that could be solved

> > > wor--
> > > > > -"

> > > > > > > > > > > is interupted, as another Dinobot who had arrived

> > > > > a
> > > > > > > > > > > spectator, but early enough to hear Grimlock,
> speaks
> > > up.
> > > > > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > > > > Swoop enters the Council chamber, and listens to
> > > > > Grimlock's
> > > > > > > > > > > inspiring speach. "If Grimlock go then Swoop go
> too.
> > > > > Dinobots
> > > > > > > deal
> > > > > > > > > > > with all kinds of stuff. Grimlock Dinobot leader,
> if
> > > > > Grimlock
> > > > > > > go,
> > > > > > > > > then
> > > > > > > > > > > Dinobots go as well." Swoop joins
> > > Grimlock, "Grimlock, put
> > > > > > > sword
> > > > > > > > > > > away you make other's nervous."
> > > > > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > > > > Pacifix looks at the two Dinobots, and nods. He
> > > returns
> > > > > his
> > > > > > > > > > > attention to the Council, "I do not mind if the
> > > Dinobots
> > > > > come
> > > > > > > > > along,
> > > > > > > > > > > yet I leave the decision up to the Council."
> Pacifix
> > > > > frowns
> > > > > > > at the
> > > > > > > > > > > gutted podium.
> > > > > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > > > > --------------------------------------------------
> ----
> > > ----
> > > > > ----
> > > > > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > > > > Crossroads stops by his quarters, and picks up all
> > > that he
> > > > > > > will
> > > > > > > > > > > bring along. He looks about his room for the last
> > > > > > > > > time, "Farewell,"
> > > > > > > > > > > He grabs his strategy papers and journals, puts
> them
> > > into
> > > > > a
> > > > > > > > > > > compartment, and exits the building. He transforms
> > > > > into 'cycle
> > > > > > > > > > > mode and heads toward the secret ship. He opens a
> > > > > commlink to
> > > > > > > > > > > JetV, "JetV, this is Crossroads, what's up? I'm
> > > heading
> > > > > to the
> > > > > > > > > ship.
> > > > > > > > > > > Make sure that you're not seen by any Preds
> or 'Cons
> > > when
> > > > > you
> > > > > > > > > > > travel there... all would be lost if that were to
> > > happen.
> > > > > > > > > Crossroads
> > > > > > > > > > > out." He screams along the freeway, and cuts off a
> > > cuts
> > > > > off a
> > > > > > > Pred
> > > > > > > > > > > freighter, showing them his feelings. The unkind
> words
> > > > > coming
> > > > > > > from
> > > > > > > > > > > the freighter proved that the feelings were
> mutual.
> > > > > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > > > >

> > > > > > > > > > >

> > > one
> > > > > can

> > > > > looks
> > > > > > > down,
> > > > > > > > > to see
> > > > > > > > > > > > the centre of the disturbance. One very large

> > > > > had
> > > > > > > > > already
> > > > > > > > > > > > smashed his desk, and was standing at his full
> > > height,
> > > > > very
> > > > > > > > > upset.
> > > > > > > > > > > > Ironhide knew he was in for trouble, "Is there a
> > > problem
> > > > > > > > > Grimlock?" He
> > > > > > > > > > > > asked, knowing there is. "YES THERE PROBLEM"
> > > Grimlock
> > > > > > > yelled,
> > > > > > > > > his
> > > > > > > > > > > > voice echoing very clearly throughout all of
> > > > > Iocon. "THIS
> > > > > > > > > BULLSHIT.

> WHOLE

> > > > > > > EVEN
> > > > > > > > > WHOLE
> > > > > > > > > > > > TIME. YOU SEND A PACIFIST!!" he declared in
> rage,
> > > as he
> > > > > > > pointed
> > > > > > > > > a
> > > > > > > > > > > > finger at Pacifix. He pulled out his energon
> sword,
> > > and
> > > > > in
> > > > > > > one
> > > > > > > > > swipe,
> > > > > > > > > > > > cleaved his whole rows podium straight in half.
> > > Grimlock
> > > > > > > > > stopped and
> > > > > > > > > > > > looked up at the main council, his sword at his
> > > side,
> > > > > energy
> > > > > > > > > > > > shimmering off it.
> > > > > > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > > > > > Ironhide sighed, how did he get a weapon in this
> > > room.
> > > > > This
> > > > > > > > > wasnt the
> > > > > > > > > > > > first time this happened. "Grimlock, you know
> that
> > > if
> > > > > one
> > > > > > > of us
> > > > > > > > > goes
> > > > > > > > > > > > the Predacons will be on to us," He said
> > > calmly. "None
> > > > > of us
> > > > > > > > > can go".
> > > > > > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > > > > > Grimlock looked back up, then crossed his arms,
> his
> > > > > sword
> > > > > > > just
> > > > > > > > > above
> > > > > > > > > > > > his head, still shimmering, the energy
> intesifing
> > > the
> > > > > look
> > > > > > > of
> > > > > > > > > rage in
> > > > > > > > > > > > his crimson eyes. "Then I go to earth to" he
> said
> > > > > quietly,
> > > > > > > and
